trans-unit.target: Move current document file to a non-public server directory. This option disables document display on your website.
Image average color, useful to create colored placeholder during image loading on your website.
Node name must be unique and is used to generate your page URL and fetch current node in Themes. It must not contain any special characters.
Tag name must be unique and is used to generate your page URL and fetch current tag in Themes. It must not contain any special characters.
A locked tag is not renamed after updating its translated title. It prevents deletion too.
A locked folder is not renamed after updating its translated title. It prevents deletion too.
SEO title allows you to write the entire title of your page. For optimal display in search engines, the title should not exceed 55 to 65 characters on average.
SEO keywords are now optional and are no longer taken into account by search engines.
SEO description is a summary in a few characters of your page. Its purpose is to briefly describe its content. This description must be between 120 and 155 characters long.
URL aliases allow you to rewrite the last part of the URL of your page for each translation. They must be different from the node name and unique throughout your site.
Automatic redirections always redirect visitors from a given request path to the up-to-date current node URL, for this translation. Created redirections will be "permanent" type.
This node-type will only hide its non-reachable children nodes
Exclude this field value from full-text search engine.
This will copy node contents from this translation.
This will propagate translation to every node children when they are not translated yet in destinaiton language.
